title: Uber wants you to use its app when exploring nearby restaurants and venues
content:
Uber started as a ride hailing service that helps people find a cab wherever they are. It’s convenient, as the car picks you up from your doorstep and takes you to the exact coordinates you choose on the map. You don’t have to unnecessarily walk, wait, or run after a taxi — which could be

The post Uber wants you to use its app when exploring nearby restaurants and venues appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Uber is rolling out an Explore tab in select cities to encourage people to use its ride hailing service when heading to nearby restaurants.
